description: An icon of popular culture more than a practical weapon, this massive pistol can shoot a variety of magnum handgun rounds depending on the conversion kit and magazine used.

variants.description: Needing little introduction, the Desert Eagle's impact on popular culture is almost as massive as the pistol itself.  The newest Mark XIX model introduced a more modern optics rail.  It was sold in multiple hard-hitting magnum calibers and can swap between them using conversion kits and the appropriate magazine.
